author: Football Italia staff
title: Commisso: '12 cases at Fiorentina'
description: President Rocco Commisso has revealed there were 12 cases of coronavirus at Fiorentina and how the situation prevented him from returning to Florence.
content:
President Rocco Commisso has revealed there were 12 cases of coronavirus at Fiorentina and how the situation prevented him from returning to Florence.
The patron was with the team when they beat Sampdoria 5-1 but after leaving the country the next day, he ha… [+1123 chars]
